Event: Opioid Reduction Act passed by West Virginia Legislature
Prescription Drug Monitoring Program (PDMP) established to track patients who may be at risk of overdose.
Wave 1: Rise in Prescription Opioid Overdose Deaths Starts
Wave 2: Rise in Heroin Overdose Deaths Starts
Wave 3: Rise in Synthetic Opioid Overdose Deaths Starts
FDA Launches the Safe Use Initiative to reduce preventable harm by opioids
FDA implements ER/LA opioids REMS program including voluntary training
FDA issues draft guidance to assist industry in developing new formulations of opioids with abuse-deterrent properties
FDA issues final guidance to assist industry in developing new formulations of opioids with abuse-deterrent properties
FDA presents research supporting Naloxone and the first generic version comes onto the market.
